nodes.name: Create a Conversation
nodes.notes: Important to use "source_id" to respond messages

nodes.name: Throw To Quepasa Chat Control Workflow

string.name: text

nodes.name: Set Text Content For Call Request

parameters.query:
=SELECT 
 display_id, 
 status
FROM conversations 
WHERE 
	account_id = '{{ $json.extra.account }}' 
	AND inbox_id = '{{ $json.extra.inbox }}'
	AND contact_id = '{{ $json.contactid }}'
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT 1

parameters.content:
## (1.0.16) Updates
* ability to skip contact, skip a new conversation creation

## Recommendations 
* Remember set timeout to 30 seconds

parameters.query:
=
SELECT id AS inreply_internal_id
FROM messages 
WHERE source_id = '{{ $json.inreply }}'
LIMIT 1

nodes.name: Throw To Quepasa Chat Control Workflow1

parameters.query:
SELECT messages.account_id, conversations.display_id as conversation_id, messages.id
FROM messages INNER JOIN conversations 
ON messages.conversation_id = conversations.id
WHERE messages.account_id = '{{ $json.body.extra.account }}' AND messages.source_id = '{{ $json.body.id }}';

SELECT messages.account_id, conversations.display_id as conversation_id, messages.id
FROM messages INNER JOIN conversations 
ON messages.conversation_id = conversations.id
WHERE messages.account_id = '{{ $json.body.extra.account }}' AND messages.id = '{{ $json.internalid }}';
